mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CLOSEFLAG, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RETURNDATA, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFINSTANCEID, t1.WFINSTANCENAME, t1.WFSTEPID, t1.WFSTEPINSTID, t1.WFSTEPINSTNAME, t1.WFSTEPLANRESTAG, t1.WFSTEPNAME FROM T_SRFWFSTEPINST t1

SELECT t1.`CLOSEFLAG`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`RETURNDATA`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFINSTANCEID`, t1.`WFINSTANCENAME`, t1.`WFSTEPID`, t1.`WFSTEPINSTID`, t1.`WFSTEPINSTNAME`, t1.`WFSTEPLANRESTAG`, t1.`WFSTEPNAME` FROM `T_SRFWFSTEPINST` t1

SELECT t1.CLOSEFLAG, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RETURNDATA, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFINSTANCEID, t1.WFINSTANCENAME, t1.WFSTEPID, t1.WFSTEPINSTID, t1.WFSTEPINSTNAME, t1.WFSTEPLANRESTAG, t1.WFSTEPNAME FROM T_SRFWFSTEPINST t1

SELECT t1.CLOSEFLAG, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RETURNDATA, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFINSTANCEID, t1.WFINSTANCENAME, t1.WFSTEPID, t1.WFSTEPINSTID, t1.WFSTEPINSTNAME, t1.WFSTEPLANRESTAG, t1.WFSTEPNAME FROM T_SRFWFSTEPINST t1

SELECT t1.CLOSEFLAG, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.RETURNDATA, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFINSTANCEID, t1.WFINSTANCENAME, t1.WFSTEPID, t1.WFSTEPINSTID, t1.WFSTEPINSTNAME, t1.WFSTEPLANRESTAG, t1.WFSTEPNAME FROM T_SRFWFSTEPINST t1

SELECT t1.[CLOSEFLAG], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[RETURNDATA], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFINSTANCEID], t1.[WFINSTANCENAME], t1.[WFSTEPID], t1.[WFSTEPINSTID], t1.[WFSTEPINSTNAME], t1.[WFSTEPLANRESTAG], t1.[WFSTEPNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFSTEPINST] t1
